name: Grave Hour
description:
The game was born on Game Jam: TIME was the theme!

Local Multiplayer! 4 Players! Free for All!

Be the last survivor! Don't Stop your hourglass! But stop the others!

MORE INFO AND VIDEO: https://www.behance.net/gallery/92240359/GraveHour-Game-Design?

Controls

Player 1 - ASDW: diretional - SPACE to throw itens

Player 2 - Arrows: diretional - ENTER to throw Itens

Player 3 - USB Control

Player 4 - USB Control

HINT: You can turn your HourGlass, but becarefull!

LORE: The Necromancer OREMOR decides to experiment with his time-manipulating power in order to play a deadly game among his minions, waiting for who will be able to win. The glory of controlling time will favor the winner for his eternity.
